price: 115. Ma aha Alle  Mid lumiya qolo kaddib markuu hanuuniyey, wuxuuse u caddeeyaa waxay tahay inay iska jiraan38. Hubaal Alle waa Ogsoonaha wax walba.
arabic: وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيُضِلَّ قَوۡمَۢا بَعۡدَ إِذۡ هَدَىٰهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ يُبَيِّنَ لَهُم مَّا يَتَّقُونَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٌ
footnotes: 38. Qofka looma cadaabo habowgiisa darti haddaan loo caddeyn waxaa inay denbi yihiin, oo uusan ku xadgudbin amarro loo caddeeyey.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamā kāna al-lahu liyuḍilla qawman baʿda idh hadāhum ḥattā yubayyina lahum mā yattaqūna inna al-laha bikulli shayin ʿalīmun
